column1: #text=Yesterday , I stood at the bus stop for over twenty minutes waiting for VTA bus 323 to show up at my stop at my community college .
#text=After the bus arrived at the stop , I scanned my Clipper Card , which gives me unlimited VTA bus rides as long as I pay my school fee of $ 5 at the start of the quarter .
#text=I walked past several people sitting in the first front rows and decided upon a window-seat near the middle of the bus .
#text=I pulled out my headphones and started listening to my own music from my phone in order to pass the time .
#text=We took off five minutes later and arrived at the first stop in about five minutes .
#text=This is an express bus , meaning it takes limited stops .
#text=Another five minutes later we arrived at the second stop , which was mine to get off at .
#text=Before arriving at the stop , I pulled the cord to initiate the voice recording which states '' `` Stop Requested '' '' .
#text=The bus driver pulled to the side , I grabbed my backpack and all my other belongings and headed off the bus .
